https://tmrev.io/movie/722860-A Praça 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null In a run down neigbourhood in east LISBON (chelas), a public square undergoes rennovation work which lasts three years. In this space, designed in pink, a depressed community, concentrated on their daily routine, lives out their lives increasingly indifferent to the outcome of the interminable public works. A Praça
